required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Transcutaneous Auricular Vagus Nerve Stimulation Treatment on Functional Dyspepsia
clinical_study.official_title: Transcutaneous Auricular Vagus Nerve Stimulation in the Treatment of Functional Dyspepsia : A Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock:
Objective: To observe the effect of the treatment of transcutaneous auricular vagus nerve stimulation (taVNS) for the functional dyspepsia (FD).
Methods: We accrued 94 patients at Beijing TongRen Hospital. All treatments were self-administered by the patients at home after training at the hospital. Patients completed questionnaires at baseline and after 4 weeks, 8 weeks, 12 weeks. The FD Symptoms Index, Functional Dyspepsia Quality of Life Scale (FDDQL), Hamilton Anxiety Scale (HAMA), Hamilton Depression Scale (HAMD), and Self-Depression Rating Scale (SDS) were performed to evaluate the therapeutic effects.
A difference of P < 0.05 was considered statistically significant.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean change from Baseline in the FD Symptoms Index at 16 Weeks
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0, 4-weeks, postintervention at Week 4, postintervention at Week 12
primary_outcome.description: FD Symptoms Index to measure the subjective symptoms of dyspepsia.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean change from Baseline in the FDQOL at 16 Weeks
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0, 4-weeks, postintervention at Week 4, postintervention at Week 12
primary_outcome.description: FDQOL to measure the subjective quality of life.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean change from Baseline in the HAMA at 16 Weeks
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0, 4-weeks, postintervention at Week 4, postintervention at Week 12
secondary_outcome.description: HAMA to measure the subjective anxiety symptoms

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean change from Baseline in the HAMD at 16 Weeks
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0, 4-weeks, postintervention at Week 4, postintervention at Week 12
secondary_outcome.description: HAMD to measure the subjective depression symptoms

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean change from Baseline in the SDS at 16 Weeks
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0, 4-weeks, postintervention at Week 4, postintervention at Week 12
secondary_outcome.description: SDS to measure the subjective depression symptoms

intervention.description: taVNS was applied using a Huatuo stimulator (SDZ-IIB) developed by Suzhou manufacture of Medical Device and Material. Stimulation parameters was 1 mA of electrical current at a frequency of 30 Hz with pulse duration ≤ 1 ms, for 30min, administered twice daily. The two electrodes were placed on the cymba conchae and concha around the left ear.

tnVNS was applied using a Huatuo stimulator (SDZ-IIB) developed by Suzhou manufacture of Medical Device and Material. Stimulation parameters was 1 mA of electrical current at a frequency of 30 Hz with pulse duration ≤ 1 ms, for 30min, administered twice daily. The two electrodes were placed on the antihelix around the left ear.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 1. Age >=18 and Age <=65. 2. Clinical diagnosis of functional dyspepsia.
Exclusion Criteria:
- 1. History of depression, tumors, thyroid disease, diabetes, cardiac diseases. 2. History of gastrointestinal surgery. 3. Pregnant or lactating women.
